scripts.build:env: sudo apt-get install libzmq3-dev -y && sudo apt install libsocketcan-dev -y && sudo apt install pkg-config -y
scripts.csp:clone: rm -rf libcsp && git clone --depth 1 --branch v1.6 https://github.com/libcsp/libcsp.git
scripts.csp:install: cd libcsp && sudo python3 waf install
scripts.build: yarn build:env && yarn csp:clone && yarn csp:configure && yarn csp:build
